title: Amsterdam
description: 4-day trip to Amsterdam exploring Dutch culture, world-class museums, and the beautiful canals
notes: I amsterdam City Card: official and third-party options listed in links below.
Anne Frank House tickets: next 6 weeks released each Tuesday at 09:00 (high demand).
Many included attractions require time-slot reservations even with the City Card.
Canal boat cruise is included with the City Card â€“ booking a time slot is required.
Heineken Experience offers 25% discount with the City Card â€“ book a time slot.
Cashless culture: most places are card-only; carry a contactless card.
Optional extras at the end include experiences not necessarily covered by the City Card.

points.name: HV6002 (Transavia)
points.description: Transavia flight from Porto to Amsterdam

points.name: Stedelijk Museum
points.description: Contemporary museum with appearance of large bathtub, showing international, modern art & design.

points.name: Museu Van Gogh
points.description: Museum housing the world's largest collection of Van Gogh paintings, alongside drawings & letters.

points.name: Vondelpark
points.description: Expansive, 19th-century urban park with a playground, ponds & an open-air theater.

points.name: Moco Museum
points.description: Art museum housed in an early-20th-century townhouse, featuring inventive works by DalÃ­ & Banksy.

points.name: Red Light Secrets Museum
points.description: Quirky museum offering exhibits on the history of Amsterdam's sex-work industry.

points.name: Rijksmuseum
points.description: 19th-century building housing Dutch Golden Age painting masterpieces & vast European art collection.

points.name: Rembrandt House Museum
points.description: Restored, 17th-century house where Rembrandt lived & worked for 20 years, hung with his etchings.

points.name: Winkel 43
points.description: Known for its apple pie, this lively cafe/bar serves hearty European snacks, lunches and dinners.

points.name: Oude Kerk
points.description: 14th-century church, now Calvinist, hosting religious & cultural activities including concerts.

points.name: Casa de Anne Frank
points.description: Museum house where Anne Frank & her family hid from the Nazis in a secret annex, during WWII.

points.name: NEMO
points.description: Interactive science exhibits, experiments & shows in a huge, waterfront, boat-like museum.

points.name: Nederlands Historisch Scheepvaartsmuseum
points.description: Interactive museum in former storehouse with virtual voyages & a replica 18th-century merchant ship.

points.name: Museu da ResistÃªncia
points.description: Museum detailing the WWII Dutch resistance through collections of photos, films & artifacts.

points.name: Hermitage de AmsterdÃ£
points.description: Amsterdam branch of the Hermitage Museum, showcasing art and cultural exhibitions.

points.name: Heineken Experience
points.description: Interactive tour through beer giant's history in former brewery, with a tasting room finale.

points.name: Zaandam
points.description: City in the province of North Holland, known for its historic windmills and traditional Dutch architecture.

points.name: A'DAM Tower
points.description: Tower with observation deck offering panoramic views of Amsterdam and Europe's highest swing.

points.name: Amsterdam Centraal
points.description: The city's largest depot, built in 1889 in Gothic-Renaissance style, including shops & restaurants.

points.name: Houseboat Museum
points.description: Museum on a 1914 freighter converted to become a houseboat, exploring life on Amsterdam's canals.

points.name: Leidseplein
points.description: Famous square known for its entertainment venues, restaurants, and vibrant nightlife.

points.name: Begijnhof
points.description: Historic courtyard and former beguinage, one of the oldest inner courts in Amsterdam.

points.name: Bloemenmarkt
points.description: Floating flower market on the Singel canal, famous for its colorful flower stalls.

points.name: PalÃ¡cio Real de AmesterdÃ£o
points.description: Grand residence for royal receptions since 1808, open to the public & exhibitions when not in use.

points.name: HV6003 (Transavia)
points.description: Transavia flight from Amsterdam back to Porto
